content:
# It seems I encountered an error while trying to place the Stone Furnace. The error indicates that I need to specify a Direction object along with the position when placing the entity.

# I will correct this by specifying a direction for the placement. 
# I will use a default direction, such as DOWN, for placing the Stone Furnace.

# Let's try placing the Stone Furnace again, this time with the correct parameters.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Position(x=-14.5, y=-14.5), Direction.DOWN)  # Attempting to place the furnace with a direction.
